#Load the tidyverse package
library(tidyverse)
#Download the TGA data file ATG.txt
#Load it into a tibble.
tib<- tibble(read.table("ATG3.txt",header= TRUE))
names(tib)

#Plot the mass (column Value) as a function of the temperature Tr (Temperature Read) with lines
library(ggplot2) 
head(tib,which.max(tib$Tr..C.))%>%
  ggplot(aes(x=Tr..C.+273,y=Value.mg.))+ 
  geom_line() +
  labs(x='T[k]',y='mass[mg]')

f<- diff(tib$Value.mg.)
g<- diff(tib$Tr..C.)
getderiv<- f/g
getderiv
